attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded I was just scrolling through my phone and decided to download it and it was the worst decision I’ve ever made so many thing wrong with this app I can’t even begin to explain how angry I am.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app as a joke just to see what it was and i then got a notification that I was being tracked and i would die soon. I got really scared and realized that it was because of the app i then deleted it and I was okay.
attributes.title: i almost died

attributes.review: The amount of time this app exited me out is ridiculous. When I was finally able to use it I saw nothing useful, only things I had already read on the news. Do not download.
attributes.title: Glitches, useless

attributes.review: This app is disgusting and so is the person who decided to make it. trump is a horrible human being and he does not even deserve an app. There are so many better people and better apps to waste time on and this is not one of them.
attributes.title: I’m horrified

attributes.review: first off the app is horrible, second off he’s a horrible president with false information, third he’s a whinny little baby and a white supremacist. what else more do you want. take this dumb app off the App Store he doesn’t deserve it AT ALL.
attributes.title: this app is horrible dump 2020

attributes.review: i don’t even think it deserves one star if i’m being honest with you donald!!!!! i mean not like you now what the word honesty means but still. the app is terrible! why? cause it’s ALL ABOUT this one guy. i don’t even know who he is!! i have since deleted it.
attributes.title: terrible!!

attributes.review: Not only did this app crash MULTIPLE times upon opening, but there was so much misinformation. Ask 45 to apologize to the exonerated five. The gear on this app is overpriced. The layout is HIDEOUS!!!! I can't believe Apple would allow propaganda to be sold in the app store
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review:
i was a strong republican looking to support my fellow
president donald j trump 😔 only to get the app and be completely harassed. i got death threats. i got emailes saying i wasn’t good enough to be a trump supporter and even worse they obv ended my poor baby chinchilla😡 called him obese. thankyou but I WILL raise my children. #biden2020
attributes.title: pure discust

attributes.review: completely terrible I couldn’t even get it to open up it kept glitching out, I suppose my phone doesn’t want such a 💩 app on it how disappointing I was just trying to be the good American I am 🇺🇸 anyways #blacklivesmatter ✨
attributes.title: Terrible!!

attributes.review: I was✨ going to vote for 🧚‍♂️Donald💅 tramp❤️ the Orange🍊 but then i realized😳 that🧚‍♀️HE 👁👅👁WAS✨DEAD💅and 🥺who can vote for a ✨dead✨                  🍊 tangerine🍊i know i can’t 👾So i said to my self why why why💖 now🧚‍♀️ All i could say was think was why ✨did Donald tramp die🥺 FORM💖 A🧚‍♂️ hydroxychloroquine 😭over dose ✨HE🧚‍♀️ DID🤡 IT 😭TO💅 HIM🧚‍♂️ SELF🧚‍♀️ 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭
